name: Kell_Tainer%27s_mother
content: This female Human was the wife of Kissek Doran and the mother of Kell Tainer. When Doran died during a mission against the Galactic Empire, she learned the truth from somebody that he died at the hands of Wes Janson, his squadron mate in the Tierfon Yellow Aces. She accused the Yellow Aces of killing her husband and destroying their family name. She would later changed their name into Tainer and move from Alderaan to Sluis Van.
